tweet: I signed on as an original cosponsor because pay discrimination in the workplace is real and people doing the same work should receive the same pay. Women must be able to challenge pay discrimination and hold employers accountable. #PaycheckFairnessAct #EqualPay
Yesterday we reintroduced the Paycheck Fairness Act, H.R. 7, to make equal pay a law and add protections to the Equal Pay Act of 1963 and the Fair Labor Standards Act. #PaycheckFairness #EqualPay
